Class EditResultsGUI

java.lang.Object
  sik.client.admin.EditResultsGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class EditResultsGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

A GUI for editing and displaying the assignment results from a student record

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322) - Manchester Metropolitan University *

Sets frame of this GUI to be centred on the screen when displayed

clear

private void clear()
Clears all the results in the results array list and set GUI text fields appropriately

save

public void save()
Saves the results to the student record object via the student store object in the records GUI listener class and also sets appropriate GUI 'mode'

setEditing

private void setEditing()
Sets the GUI to be in 'edit mode'. Also, if there are no results available in the student record object in the records GUI listener class it sets the result fields to be of text "" in order to not try and save null values

loadResultsArea

private void loadResultsArea()
Prepares the results area panel elements of this GUI

setTextAreasEditable

private void setTextAreasEditable(boolean b)
Sets whether the result area' text fields are editable or not, which is based on what mode the GUI is in (editing or viewing)

Parameters:
b - Which 'mode' to set to
